sentence.Network_en: But until 1949 , the capitol hill just pass the National as a sempiternal festival.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: from Old French sempiternel or late Latin sempiternalis, from Latin sempiternus, from semper 'always' + aeternus 'eternal'

means.word_mean: 1. having no known beginning and presumably no end;

sentences.sentence: "the dateless rise and fall of the tides"
